title: Add Local Transfer and Rental pricing tables to the Rate Card pricing section

requirements.text: Update the Rate Card on-page pricing display (frontend/src/components/RatePricingSection.tsx) to include two additional pricing sections, using English labels and the exact values provided by the user: (1) a "Local Transfer" section with minimum distance and base price plus extra per-km price for SEDAN, SUV, Innova, and CRYSTA; and (2) a "Rental Rate Card" section with package duration+distance and base price plus extra per-hour and extra per-km prices for SEDAN, SUV, Innova, and CRYSTA. Keep the existing per-km One-way/Round-trip pricing and the existing "Additional Information" (driver allowance, minimum coverage) visible as well.

acceptanceCriteria: RatePricingSection shows the existing "Current Pricing" (one-way/round-trip per-km) and "Additional Information" sections unchanged in meaning (same values as currently displayed).

A new "Local Transfer" section is displayed with these exact values: SEDAN minimum 20 km = ₹600, extra per km = ₹25; SUV minimum 20 km = ₹900, extra per km = ₹38; Innova minimum 20 km = ₹1000, extra per km = ₹40; CRYSTA minimum 50 km = ₹2250, extra per km = ₹45.

A new "Rental Rate Card" section is displayed with these exact values: SEDAN 5 hr / 50 km = ₹1500, extra hour = ₹280, extra per km = ₹25; SUV 5 hr / 50 km = ₹1900, extra hour = ₹400, extra per km = ₹38; Innova 5 hr / 50 km = ₹2200, extra hour = ₹400, extra per km = ₹40; CRYSTA 5 hr / 50 km = ₹2500, extra hour = ₹450, extra per km = ₹45.
All new user-facing text for the added sections is in English (e.g., "Local Transfer", "Minimum distance", "Extra per km", "Rental Rate Card", "Package", "Extra per hour").
The added sections are responsive like the existing pricing UI (usable on both mobile and desktop layouts without horizontal overflow).

The Rate Card document download/upload UI on frontend/src/pages/RateCardPage.tsx remains functional and visible below the pricing section (no regressions to downloading the current file or admin upload flow).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT; compose existing UI components instead.
Keep the backend single-actor architecture unchanged; no backend changes are required for this pricing-display-only update.
nonGoals: Do not change backend rate card storage, upload/download APIs, or admin authorization logic.
Do not add new pages or navigation items; only update the pricing display content/layout on the existing Rate Card page.
